properties.description: Allows the card to be clickable with a ripple effect.

elements.name: md-data-table-cell
elements.description:
---


### **Events:**
 - **checked** - Event emitted when the cell checkbox has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `checked` property.

events.name: checked
events.description: Event emitted when the cell checkbox has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `checked` property.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Cell type. If `checkbox`, the checkbox inside the cell will also be created if not supplied via default slot.
If `numeric`, the cell text will be aligned to the right.

events.name: checked
events.description: Event emitted when the cell checkbox has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `checked` property.

elements.name: md-data-table-column
elements.description:
---


### **Events:**
 - **checked** - Event emitted when the column checkbox has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `checked` property.
- **filter** - Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `field`, `text`, `column`, `caseSensitive` and `customFiltering` properties.
- **keydown** - Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `field`, `key` and `column` properties.
- **sort** - Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `column`, `isDescending` and `customSorting` properties.

events.name: checked
events.description: Event emitted when the column checkbox has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `checked` property.

events.name: filter
events.description: Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `field`, `text`, `column`, `caseSensitive` and `customFiltering` properties.

events.name: keydown
events.description: Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `field`, `key` and `column` properties.

events.name: sort
events.description: Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `column`, `isDescending` and `customSorting` properties.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Column type. If `checkbox`, the checkbox inside the column will be also created if not supplied via the default slot.
If `numeric`, the column label will be aligned to the right.

properties.name: sortable
properties.description: Whether the column can be sorted.

properties.name: sorted
properties.description: Whether the column is sorted.

properties.name: sortedDescending
properties.description: Whether the column is sorted descending.

properties.name: withSortButton
properties.description: Whether the column is displaying a sort button.

properties.name: customSorting
properties.description:
Whether the column is using a custom sorting function. If true, the column will not sort automatically and
you will need to handle the sorting yourself (see `sort` event).

properties.name: filterable
properties.description: Whether the column can be filtered.

properties.name: filterTextFieldLabel
properties.description: Label to show on the filter textfield.

properties.name: filterCaseSensitive
properties.description: Sets the filtering to be case-sensitive.

properties.name: customFiltering
properties.description:
Whether the column is using a custom filtering function. If true, the column will not filter automatically and
you will need to handle the filtering yourself (see `filter` event).

events.name: checked
events.description: Event emitted when the column checkbox has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `checked` property.

events.name: filter
events.description: Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `field`, `text`, `column`, `caseSensitive` and `customFiltering` properties.

events.name: keydown
events.description: Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `field`, `key` and `column` properties.

events.name: sort
events.description: Event emitted when the user has typed in column filter textfield. Detail contains the `column`, `isDescending` and `customSorting` properties.

elements.name: md-data-table-row
elements.description:
---


### **Events:**
 - **selected** - Event emitted when a row has been selected or unselected. Detail contains the `selected` property.

events.name: selected
events.description: Event emitted when a row has been selected or unselected. Detail contains the `selected` property.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Whether the row is selected.

properties.name: density
properties.description: Overall height of the table. Available in three different measures.

properties.name: cells
properties.description: Cells of the row.

events.name: selected
events.description: Event emitted when a row has been selected or unselected. Detail contains the `selected` property.

elements.name: md-data-table
elements.description:
---


### **Events:**
 - **row-selection-changed** - Event emitted when row checkbox is checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `row` element, `rowIndex` and `selected`.
- **selected-all** - Event emitted when header row checkbox is checked.
- **unselected-all** - Event emitted when header row checkbox is unchecked.
- **row-click** - Event emitted when a row has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `row` element, `rowIndex` and `selected`.
- **filtered** - Event emitted when the data table has been filtered. Detail contains the `column` element, `text`, `caseSensitive` and `columnIndex`.
- **sorted** - Event emitted when the data table has been sorted. Detail contains the `column` element and `isDescending`.
- **page-size-change** - Event emitted when the page size has been changed. Detail contains the `pageSize`.
- **page-changed** - Event emitted when the page has been changed. Detail contains the `action`.
- **paginate** - Event emitted when the data table has been paginated. Detail contains the `firstRow`, `lastRow`, `pageSize` and `action`.

events.name: row-selection-changed
events.description: Event emitted when row checkbox is checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `row` element, `rowIndex` and `selected`.

events.name: selected-all
events.description: Event emitted when header row checkbox is checked.

events.name: unselected-all
events.description: Event emitted when header row checkbox is unchecked.

events.name: row-click
events.description: Event emitted when a row has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `row` element, `rowIndex` and `selected`.

events.name: filtered
events.description: Event emitted when the data table has been filtered. Detail contains the `column` element, `text`, `caseSensitive` and `columnIndex`.

events.name: sorted
events.description: Event emitted when the data table has been sorted. Detail contains the `column` element and `isDescending`.

events.name: page-size-change
events.description: Event emitted when the page size has been changed. Detail contains the `pageSize`.

events.name: page-changed
events.description: Event emitted when the page has been changed. Detail contains the `action`.

events.name: paginate
events.description: Event emitted when the data table has been paginated. Detail contains the `firstRow`, `lastRow`, `pageSize` and `action`.

properties.name: paginated
properties.description: Enable/disable pagination.

properties.name: pageSizes
properties.description: JSON array with the page sizes to be used in the pagination and shown as page size select options.

properties.name: pageSizesLabel
properties.description: Label to show before the page size select.

properties.name: currentFirstRow
properties.description: Index of the first row to be shown on the current page.

properties.name: currentPageSize
properties.description: Size of the current page.

properties.name: currentLastRow
properties.description: Index of the last row to be shown on the current page.

properties.name: totalRows
properties.description: Total number of rows in the data table to show in the pagination label and

properties.name: paginationTotalLabel
properties.description:
Label pattern to show after the page size select that indicates the current rows shown in the page.
It should contain the following parameters: `:firstRow`, `:lastRow`, `:totalRows`

properties.name: customPagination
properties.description:
Whether the data table is using a custom pagination function. If true, the automatic pagination is disabled and
the `current-first-row`, `current-last-row` and `current-page-size` attributes are not updated automatically.
You'll have to handle the pagination yourself by listening to the `paginate` event and updating the
`current-first-row`, `current-last-row` and `current-page-size` attributes accordingly.

properties.name: inProgress
properties.description: Whether the loading indicator is active.

properties.name: density
properties.description: Overall height of the table. Available in three different measures.

events.name: row-selection-changed
events.description: Event emitted when row checkbox is checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `row` element, `rowIndex` and `selected`.

events.name: selected-all
events.description: Event emitted when header row checkbox is checked.

events.name: unselected-all
events.description: Event emitted when header row checkbox is unchecked.

events.name: row-click
events.description: Event emitted when a row has been checked or unchecked. Detail contains the `row` element, `rowIndex` and `selected`.

events.name: filtered
events.description: Event emitted when the data table has been filtered. Detail contains the `column` element, `text`, `caseSensitive` and `columnIndex`.

events.name: sorted
events.description: Event emitted when the data table has been sorted. Detail contains the `column` element and `isDescending`.

events.name: page-size-change
events.description: Event emitted when the page size has been changed. Detail contains the `pageSize`.

events.name: page-changed
events.description: Event emitted when the page has been changed. Detail contains the `action`.

events.name: paginate
events.description: Event emitted when the data table has been paginated. Detail contains the `firstRow`, `lastRow`, `pageSize` and `action`.

properties.name: fixedColumnWidth
properties.description: You can designate each column to have a certain width. The column width can be specified through the CSS custom property `--mdc-layout-grid-column-width-{screen_size}`. The column width is set to 72px on all devices by default.

properties.name: align
properties.description: The grid is by default center aligned. You can set this attribute to `left` or `right` to change this behavior. Note, these modifiers will have no effect when the grid already fills its container.

properties.name: fixedColumnWidth
properties.description: You can designate each column to have a certain width. The column width can be specified through the CSS custom property `--mdc-layout-grid-column-width-{screen_size}`. The column width is set to 72px on all devices by default.

properties.name: align
properties.description: The grid is by default center aligned. You can set this attribute to `left` or `right` to change this behavior. Note, these modifiers will have no effect when the grid already fills its container.
